modules.name: computational_analysis_of_communication
recommendedLiterature: van Atteveldt, W., Trilling, D., & Arcila, C. (2021). Computational Analysis of Communication: A practical introduction to the analysis of texts, networks, and images with code examples in Python and R. http://cssbook.net/
